name: G.G. Series ASSAULT BUSTER
description: You are the last defense against the assault of a robot army! Pit yourself against wave after wave of enemy forces while using your high speed boost maneuver to fly in 8 different directions to avoid fire with the goal of total enemy annihilation. Defeating any enemies on screen will decrease the "enemy potential" gauge which will give way to a powerful boss upon reaching zero. Keep an eye out for flying cargo boxes which will yield helpful items if destroyed. Hold your ground as the Assault Buster!
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
